1: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> [לִידִיתוּן כ] (לִֽידוּת֗וּן <sup>3038 </sup> <n>Jeduthun</n> ק) מִזְמ֥וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> אָמַ֗רְתִּי <sup>559 </sup> <n>I said</n> אֶֽשְׁמְרָ֣ה <sup>8104 </sup> <n>I will take heed</n> דְרָכַי֮ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>to my ways</n> מֵחֲט֪וֹא <sup>2398 </sup> <n>that I sin</n> בִלְשׁ֫וֹנִ֥י <sup>3956 </sup> <n>not with my tongue</n> אֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה <sup>8104 </sup> <n>I will keep</n> לְפִ֥י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>my mouth</n> מַחְס֑וֹם <sup>4269 </sup> <n>with a bridle</n> בְּעֹ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> רָשָׁ֣ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>while the wicked</n> לְנֶגְדִּֽי׃ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>my presence</n>
2: נֶאֱלַ֣מְתִּי <sup>481 </sup> <n>I was dumb</n> ד֭וּמִיָּה <sup>1747 </sup> <n>with silence</n> הֶחֱשֵׁ֣יתִי <sup>2814 </sup> <n>I held my peace</n> מִטּ֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[even] from good</n> וּכְאֵבִ֥י <sup>3511 </sup> <n>and my sorrow</n> נֶעְכָּֽר׃ <sup>5916 </sup> <n>was stirred</n>
3: חַם־ <sup>2552 </sup> <n>was hot</n> לִבִּ֨י ׀ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>My heart</n> בְּקִרְבִּ֗י <sup>7130 </sup> <n>within</n> בַּהֲגִיגִ֥י <sup>1901 </sup> <n>me while I was musing</n> תִבְעַר־ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>burned</n> אֵ֑שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>the fire</n> דִּ֝בַּ֗רְתִּי <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> בִּלְשֽׁוֹנִי׃ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>I with my tongue</n>
4: הוֹדִ֘יעֵ֤נִי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>make me to know</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>LORD</n> קִצִּ֗י <sup>7093 </sup> <n>mine end</n> וּמִדַּ֣ת <sup>4060 </sup> <n>and the measure</n> יָמַ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>of my days</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>and what</n> הִ֑יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>me</n> אֵ֝דְעָ֗ה <sup>3045 </sup> <n>what it [is that] I may know</n> מֶה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>how</n> חָדֵ֥ל <sup>2310 </sup> <n>how frail</n> אָֽנִי׃ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n>
5: הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> טְפָח֨וֹת ׀ <sup>2947 </sup> <n>[as] an handbreadth</n> נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Behold thou hast made</n> יָמַ֗י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>my days</n> וְחֶלְדִּ֣י <sup>2465 </sup> <n>and mine age</n> כְאַ֣יִן <sup>369 </sup> <n>nothing</n> נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>your sight</n> אַ֥ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>[is] as nothing before thee verily every</n> הֶ֥בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>vanity</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>[is] altogether</n> אָ֝דָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n> נִצָּ֥ב <sup>5324 </sup> <n>at his best state</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
6: אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> בְּצֶ֤לֶם ׀ <sup>6754 </sup> <n>in a vain shew</n> יִֽתְהַלֶּךְ־ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walketh</n> אִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>Surely every man</n> אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> הֶ֥בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>in vain</n> יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <sup>1993 </sup> <n>surely they are disquieted</n> יִ֝צְבֹּ֗ר <sup>6651 </sup> <n>he heapeth up</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> יֵדַ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[riches] and knoweth</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> אֹסְפָֽם׃ <sup>622 </sup> <n>not who shall gather</n>
7: וְעַתָּ֣ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> קִּוִּ֣יתִי <sup>6960 </sup> <n>what wait</n> אֲדֹנָ֑י <sup>136 </sup> <n>And now Lord</n> תּ֝וֹחַלְתִּ֗י <sup>8431 </sup> <n>I for? my hope</n> לְךָ֣ הִֽיא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
8: מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> פְּשָׁעַ֥י <sup>6588 </sup> <n>me from all my transgressions</n> הַצִּילֵ֑נִי <sup>5337 </sup> <n>Deliver</n> חֶרְפַּ֥ת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>me not the reproach</n> נָ֝בָ֗ל <sup>5036 </sup> <n>of the foolish</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תְּשִׂימֵֽנִי׃ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>make</n>
9: נֶ֭אֱלַמְתִּי <sup>481 </sup> <n>I was dumb</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶפְתַּח־ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>I opened</n> פִּ֑י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>not my mouth</n> כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>who</n> עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>because thou didst</n>
10: הָסֵ֣ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>away</n> מֵעָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נִגְעֶ֑ךָ <sup>5061 </sup> <n>thy stroke</n> מִתִּגְרַ֥ת <sup>8409 </sup> <n>by the blow</n> יָ֝דְךָ֗ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thine hand</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> כָלִֽיתִי׃ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>from me I am consumed</n>
11: בְּֽתוֹכָ֘ח֤וֹת <sup>8433 </sup> <n>When thou with rebukes</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> עָוֹ֨ן ׀ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>for iniquity</n> יִסַּ֬רְתָּ <sup>3256 </sup> <n>dost correct</n> אִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> וַתֶּ֣מֶס <sup>4529 </sup> <n>to consume away</n> כָּעָ֣שׁ <sup>6211 </sup> <n>like a moth</n> חֲמוּד֑וֹ <sup>2530 </sup> <n>thou makest his beauty</n> אַ֤ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Surely</n> הֶ֖בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>[is] vanity</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> אָדָ֣ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>surely every man</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n>
12: שִֽׁמְעָ֥ה־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> תְפִלָּתִ֨י ׀ <sup>8605 </sup> <n>my prayer</n> יְהוָ֡ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> וְשַׁוְעָתִ֨י ׀ <sup>7775 </sup> <n>unto my cry</n> הַאֲזִינָה֮ <sup>238 </sup> <n>and give ear</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>at</n> דִּמְעָתִ֗י <sup>1832 </sup> <n>at my tears</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֶּ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>hold not thy peace</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>I am a</n> גֵ֣ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>for I [am] a stranger</n> אָנֹכִ֣י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> עִמָּ֑ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>You</n> תּ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב <sup>8453 </sup> <n>with thee [and] a sojourner</n> כְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲבוֹתָֽי׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>as all my fathers</n>
